abstract: 'Don't stop with one doctor, because their answer might not be the right one.'
description: In Robert Hill's family, three of them have a disability, all diagnosed later in life. Despite their various stuggles, the Hill family have pulled each other through and will continue to do so.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002121; Hidden treasure : thoughts about living with Turner's Syndrome : Digital Storytelling project; Active; 2006
